{{stub}}
The '''Ilkorindi''' (also '''Ilkorins''') was an Elven race according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. It was applied to those [[Elves]] who were "not of [[Kôr]]" (cf. ''[[Úmanyar]]'' "not of [[Aman]]") and it referred to the [[Elves]] who stayed in the [[Great Lands]]. Their language was [[Ilkorin]].<ref>{{HM|IX}}, p. 238</ref>
In later versions of the legendarium, the Ilkorindi seemingly became the [[Umanyar]], specifically the [[Avari]], [[Nandor]] and [[Sindar]] Elves described in the later Silmarillion.
